sentences.en: Although he had been treated with antibiotics, he went to the bathroom repeatedly.
sentences.cn: 虽然他已经服用了抗生素，但他还是不停地上厕所。

sentences.en: Both men have repeatedly denied the allegations.
sentences.cn: 两个人都再三地否认这些指控。

sentences.en: Graham was repeatedly warned not to work so hard.
sentences.cn: 格雷厄姆一再被提醒工作不要这么拼命。

sentences.en: Gunmen have repeatedly sniped at US Army positions.
sentences.cn: 持枪匪徒一再朝美军阵地放冷枪。

sentences.en: He developed nervous problems after people began repeatedly correcting him.
sentences.cn: 人们开始不停地纠正他的错误，之后他的神经就出现了问题。

sentences.en: He repeatedly distinguished himself in the troops.
He repeatedly mispronounced words and slurred his speech.
sentences.cn: 他一再读错单词，而且说话含含糊糊的。

sentences.en: He was repeatedly attacked by other inmates, who accused him of grassing.
sentences.cn: 他屡遭指责他告密的其他囚犯的殴打。

sentences.en: I object to being repeatedly dropped on in this manner.
sentences.cn: 我反对用这种方式屡次被挑中.

sentences.en: Mr Adams was repeatedly bullied and picked on by manageress Elizabeth Archer.
sentences.cn: 女经理伊丽莎白·阿彻多次胁迫和刁难亚当斯先生。

sentences.en: Raft repeatedly hurled verbal abuse at his co-star.
sentences.cn: 拉夫特不断地破口大骂和他联合主演的演员。

sentences.en: She claimed she was repeatedly passed over for promotion.
sentences.cn: 她声称在晋升时自己被一次又一次地排除在外。

sentences.en: She repeatedly urged her son not to tell anyone about it.
sentences.cn: 她一再丁宁儿子不要和任何人讲这事.

sentences.en: The drug's effect does not tail off after it has been used repeatedly.
sentences.cn: 反复使用本药，药效也不会减弱。

sentences.en: The rebel soldiers tried repeatedly to storm the building.
sentences.cn: 叛军屡次尝试强攻这座建筑。

sentences.en: The voyage home began, but not before an intruding aeroplane had repeatedly circled the ship.
sentences.cn: 开始返航了，但是在这之前一架入侵的飞机曾反复在轮船上空盘旋。

sentences.en: They repeatedly questioned his leadership abilities.
sentences.cn: 他们一再质疑他的领导才能。

words.tran_cn: [通信] 中继器；[通信] 转发器；重复者

trans.tran_cn: 反复地，重复地，再三地，屡次地，不停地
